name: International Conference on Recent Advances in Physics ICRAP-2018
content: International Conference on Recent Advances in Physics ICRAP-2018 is a three-day scientific event organized by Dept. of Physics, The University of Lahore, Pakistan. The conference aims to cover major divisions of Physics including Materials Science, Particle Physics, Medical Physics, Computational Physics and Physics Education. This scientific event will provide a plate-form to young researchers and senior experts in different areas of physics to share their ideas and recent contributions in respective fields.
organizers: Department of Physics, The University of Lahore
